feed.title: Combined summary - Please trim excessive quoting

entry.title: Combined summary - Please trim excessive quoting
entry.summary: When sending messages to a particular list, it is necessary to keep in mind that messages over 40Kbytes in size need moderation approval before being posted. Gavin Andresen, the sender of the message, conveyed this important information. To ensure messages are posted promptly, it is highly recommended to trim excessive quoting before hitting send. By following these guidelines, delays in posting messages on the list can be avoided.
